tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was wonderful. They were so pleasant and serene. I was actually panicking because I had previously had treatment for property teeth, but it was extremely painful, so I was terrified. However, the doctor handled me extremely well. Even she put me at ease. To be honest, she treated me with respect and made the situation much less painful. Now for every treatment I'm going to them

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The care given to the treatment was commendable. The Doctor explained everything patiently & discussed each & every step taken! Lots of importance was given to aesthetics & long term stability of the crown. He accompanied me to the lab to ensure that the colour matching was perfect! 
I am very happy with the final result!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Israel made the procedure very smooth for me. He was very friendly and quite supportive. Even the support staff was very supportive

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review: Doctor explained problem clearly. Fees was reasonable. Gave appointments easy and faster . Friendly
The Doctor and his Asst. are more friendly and explained briefly the treatments I have to undergo and very adjusting type.
Doctor Misba Afreen mam is so patience. she explained the procedure very nicely. And the doc sir also very friendly. I like the environment.

review: I've been visiting Aura for the past 5+ years and very happy with Dr Mac and the other dental surgeons. My family also goes to him for all dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are visiting dr Aziz since several years he is Friendly and precise in his work but he wears girly shoes

Nice Dentist, very friendly, will recommend.
The price and he does a lot of social activities also,by doing free medical care
